display_help: You draw a blade of ice and a blade of flame and unleash a quick succession of strikes at your target. While the attacks are so fast that the target is unable to catch fire, they suffer a tremendous burst of damage and have a chance to be knockdown with the final blows.
display_target_help: You are caught in the Season's End, suffering fire and cold damage from a frenzy of blows.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
